animeDescription: Blue moon suddenly appeared near the moon, they called it True Moon. After 3 years when True Moon shined blue, a monster appeared in front of Ryo. He ran away from the monster, but finally, the monster cornered him. When he began to accept his death, a red eyed girl, Izumi, appeared. She cut the monster to death, and gone.  (Source: AnimeNfo)
animeStaff: [['Fujimoto Jirou', ['Script']], ['AliceSoft', ['Original Creator']], ['Sekiya Yoshihiro', ['Director of Photography']], ['Mori Hisashi', ['Key Animation']]]
